p: Of the 348 substantiated public health events reported to WHO in the African Region from 2017 to 2019, we selected 296 disease outbreaks for the study. Key milestone dates were often missing, and therefore we only included 184 (62%) events for time to detection, 232 (78%) events for time to notification, and 201 (68%) events for time to end ( Figure 1). The percentage of events included in the study for each outcome of interest slightly decreased from 2017 through 2019, after exclusion of outbreaks with missing data, across each year ( Tables 1, 2).
